name: Daily News for Stock Market Prediction
data_intro: There are two channels of data provided in this dataset:

cat_feature_intro.Date: Sun, J. (2016, August). Daily News for Stock Market Prediction, Version 1. Retrieved [Date You Retrieved This Data] from https://www.kaggle.com/aaron7sun/stocknews.
cat_feature_intro.Top1: The first column is "Date", the second is "Label", and the following ones are news headlines ranging from "Top1" to "Top25".
cat_feature_intro.Top2: The first column is "Date", the second is "Label", and the following ones are news headlines ranging from "Top1" to "Top25".
cat_feature_intro.Top25: The first column is "Date", the second is "Label", and the following ones are news headlines ranging from "Top1" to "Top25".

num_feature_intro.Label: *I made this a binary classification task. Hence, there are only two labels:*
num_feature_intro.Low: *For task evaluation, please use data from 2008-08-08 to 2014-12-31 as Training Set, and Test Set is then the following two years data (from 2015-01-02 to 2016-07-01). This is roughly a 80%/20% split.*
num_feature_intro.Close: *"0" when DJIA Adj Close value decreased.*
num_feature_intro.Adj Close: *"0" when DJIA Adj Close value decreased.*
